about.summary: SWIG bindings for the LDAS Tools abstraction toolkit
SWIG interface for the LDAS Tools generic library
Python bindings for the LDAS Tools generic library
SWIG interface for the LDAS Tools generic library
Python bindings for the LDAS Tools generic library
SWIG interface for the LDAS Tools generic library
Python bindings for the LDAS Tools generic library

name: ldas-tools-ldasgen-swig
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ldas-tools-ldasgen-swig" %}
{% set version = "2.6.6" %}
{% set sha256 = "721f6eaaec5ad5892fab1e86fa9f7fd53f4521b105d151f21fc38ae22ded41cb" %}
{% set ldas_tools_cmake_version = "1.0.7" %}
{% set ldas_tools_al_version = "2.6.6" %}
{% set ldas_tools_ldasgen_version = "2.6.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1000
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake >=3.6
    - pkg-config  # [not win]
    - make  # [not win]
    - swig
  host:
    - ldas-tools-cmake >={{ ldas_tools_cmake_version }}
    - ldas-tools-ldasgen >={{ ldas_tools_ldasgen_version }}

outputs:
  - name: ldas-tools-ldasgen-swig
    script: install-interface.sh
    build:
      activate_in_script: True
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake >=3.6
        - pkg-config  # [not win]
        - make  # [not win]
        - swig
      host:
        - ldas-tools-cmake >={{ ldas_tools_cmake_version }}
        - ldas-tools-ldasgen >={{ ldas_tools_ldasgen_version }}
      run:
        - ldas-tools-ldasgen >={{ ldas_tools_ldasgen_version }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/genericAPI/LDASlogging.i  # [not win]
    about:
      home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LDASTools
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/ldastools/LDAS_Tools
      license: GPLv3
      license_family: GPL
      license_file: COPYING
      summary: SWIG interface for the LDAS Tools generic library
  - name: python-ldas-tools-ldasgen
    script: install-python.sh
    build:
      activate_in_script: true
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake >=3.6
        - pkg-config  # [not win]
        - make  # [not win]
        - swig
      host:
        - ldas-tools-cmake >={{ ldas_tools_cmake_version }}
        - ldas-tools-ldasgen >={{ ldas_tools_ldasgen_version }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('ldas-tools-ldasgen-swig', exact=True) }}
        - python
      run:
        - python
        - ldas-tools-ldasgen >={{ ldas_tools_ldasgen_version }}
        - python-ldas-tools-al >={{ ldas_tools_al_version }}
    test:
      imports:
        - LDAStools.LDASlogging
    about:
      home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LDASTools
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/ldastools/LDAS_Tools
      license: GPLv3
      license_family: GPL
      license_file: COPYING
      summary: Python bindings for the LDAS Tools generic library

about:
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LDASTools
  license: GPLv3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: SWIG bindings for the LDAS Tools abstraction toolkit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - emaros
